text: Naga chili chimâ€™bichilile (chindu) chambone chikasachasakalisyaga, nambo naga chili chimpatile chakusakala akasasengwaga nacho, nambo naga mpilile nikuwa niwoga (wakun'jogopa Allah), nikuti malindi gao ngawa nkuntenda chilichose. Chisimu Allah ichindu yaakutenda wanganyao juwele Jwaisyungula (kwaimanya chenene)
